title: HoP 310 - Purple Prose - Byzantine Political Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 310 - Purple Prose - Byzantine Political Philosophy
description: Byzantine political thought from the time of Justinian down to the Palaiologos dynasty wrestles with the nature and scope of imperial power.
